com.mesosphere.sdk.http.endpoints

Class PodResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.http.types.PrettyJsonResource
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.http.endpoints.PodResource

  • public class PodResource
extends PrettyJsonResource
    A read-only API for accessing information about the pods which compose the service, and restarting/replacing those pods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PodResource(StateStore stateStore, ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore, java.lang.String serviceName)
      Creates a new instance which retrieves task/pod state from the provided StateStore.
